name: Ernesto Gomez
text: DJ. BOOTS THANK YOU FOR THE AWESOME JOB YOU DID. MUSIC WAS GREAT YOU HAD US ON OUR FEET DANCING AWAY.... VERY WELL RECOMMEND YOU TO ANYONE. I GIVE YOU 5 STARS. THANK YOU ONCE AGAIN

name: Ruben Guzman
text: Had the honor of helping coordinate a huge event this weekend. I have to say DJ Boots was amazing! 5 stars for him. Book him for your next event and y'all know I'm picky

name: Perla Gomez
text: DJ Boots is an awesome dj! I highly and truly recommend him

name: Carmen Baker
text: Thank you DJ Boots for going the extra mile with the music. Karina had the best dance ever especially enjoyed how you changed it up and made my age group close out the night with very special finish. My husband was very pleased and believe me he was very happy :heart:

name: Joana Sanchez
text: Thank you for everything :thumbsup: Best DJ!

name: Ed
text: Just wanted to thank you for the support you’ve given us at every event we see you. You and your team do such great work! Your system is on point. The attention you put so that your system works perfectly is great! Thank you for being on top of this with all the quinceañera programs and such. Keep doing what your doing. I will totally recommend you to anyone who is looking for the best Dj. Thank you again for your professionalism. See you at the other great events you’ll be at.

name: Humberto Ortega
text: I recommend Dj Boots for any type of celebrations, Bryan was available at the last minute when I needed someone to Dj on my Wedding, he was flexible with his equipment and hours. At the time of the wedding everything was coming all together I was nervous and when I least expected the guy from the audio equipment I had rented was running late, the band that was going to play in my wedding was at the ballroom already to do sound check, it was that time that the band had to start playing already and Bryan from Dj Boots went above & beyond to provide audio equipment for the band to start playing. When Me & My Wife got to the ballroom we did the entrance everything looked perfect the music sound excellent. I thank Bryan for being professional at his work and being a friend.
